about_bio: My name is Andy (@M4ss1ck on almost all my social media). I hold a Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, am a passionate programmer, and an enthusiast of technology.
extended_bio: Throughout my career, I have combined my mathematical knowledge with my programming skills to tackle complex problems and develop innovative solutions. I am dedicated to continuous learning and exploring new trends in the tech field, always looking for ways to apply my skills to challenging and creative projects.
portfolio_description: Here you can find some of the projects I've worked on.
